page.title: 11A schoolboy's week
page.content: Nick is ten and lives in Tetchill. He attends Ellesmere primary school since there is no school in Tetchill. On most mornings he gets up at seven although it may be earlier in summer. The school bus should collect him at 0845 although it is often late. In the evenings he gets home at 1550. He may play adventure games with friends but otherwise watches TV or plays on the family's computer. Until recently he went to Ellesmere cubs on Thursdays.He or his sister takes the dog for a walk and, during the summer,he helps in the garden. He goes to bed about nine o'clock.On Saturdays he again plays on the computer but occasionally he is taken with a friend to watch Liverpool FC. On Sunday mornings and evenings he goes to Ellesmere parish church where he sings in the choir.In the afternoon he is content to laze or garden!
